name: 曾恕銘
objective: 本課程涵蓋資通訊技術的基礎和最新發展，內容包含網際網路工程，消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準 (Huffman for MPEG2 CAVLC for H.264)，錯誤更正碼(convolutional,turbo,LDPC/Polar code, for 4G,5G 802.11ac,DVB-T/T2/S/C2, NAND flash memory)，競爭型的多重存取協定(WiFi的CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS，乙太網路的CSMA/CD) ，無線視訊傳輸的抗錯(HARQ, MDC, 最佳化理論(含線性規劃))，隨意網路和感測網路，網路流量/排隊理論，物聯網
schedule:
1.　　Network Protocols (網際網路工程)
2.　　IT  source coding for video standards (Huffman for MPEG2 CAVLC for H.264)
3.　　IT channel coding introduction (消息理論和錯誤更正碼簡介)
4.　　convolutional codes
5.　　turbo codes for 4G
6.　　LDPC codes/Polar codes for 5G
7.   Multiple access protocols in layer 2 (CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS for Wi-Fi)
8. 　　Error resilience(抗錯) in wireless video transmission(HARQ(RCPC+CRC), MDC, Cross-layer control, 最佳化理論(含線性規劃)
9.   Ad hoc and sensor network(隨意網路和感測網路)
10.　　Traffic Theories (Poisson arrivals 排隊理論)
11.  IoT
scorePolicy:
Oral report 1(part of handouts): 20%
Exam: 40% 
Oral report 2 (cross-layer resource allocation in multimedia communications, joint source/channel coding, ad hoc network, vehicular ICT, IoT/WoT, NOMA etc.): 30%
Class participation: 10%
